United States social distancing policies for COVID-19

Source: R/us_state_distancing_policy.R
us_state_distancing_policy.Rd

An updated, curated set of social distancing and non-pharmaceutical interventions for a subset of the states in the United States.

us_state_distancing_policy()

Source

  • https://github.com/COVID19StatePolicy/SocialDistancing/

Kudos

  • Joe Wasserman: http://www.joewasserman.com/

See also

Other data-import: beoutbreakprepared_data(), covidtracker_data(), descartes_mobility_data(), healthdata_projections_data(), jhu_data(), jhu_us_data(), kff_icu_beds(), nytimes_county_data(), us_county_geo_details(), us_healthcare_capacity(), usa_facts_data()

Examples

res = us_state_distancing_policy()
#> Warning: Missing column names filled in: 'X16' [16], 'X17' [17], 'X18' [18], 'X19' [19]
colnames(res)
#>  [1] "location_id"       "StateFIPS"         "StatePostal"      
#>  [4] "StateName"         "StatePolicy"       "Mandate"          
#>  [7] "DateIssued"        "DateEnacted"       "DateExpiry"       
#> [10] "DateEnded"         "PolicyCodingNotes" "PolicySource"     
#> [13] "StateWide"         "LastUpdated"       "LastUpdatedNotes" 
#> [16] "X16"               "X17"               "X18"              
#> [19] "X19"              
library(dplyr)
dplyr::glimpse(res)
